requirements.0: Have a pet in your househould
requirements.2: Use friendly-type social interactions with animals 12 total times
Successfully train out two bad behaviors in pets. Can apply to a single pet

requirements.1: Use the feel the love interaction with pets 5 total times
requirements.2: Successfully train out four bad behaviors in pets. The counter is reset upon achieving this level, so the previous two will not count toward it.

requirements.0: Use the Play social interaction with two dead pets. Remember there is a pet cemetery near the lighthouse in Bridleton Bay
requirements.1: Feel the love with 8 different pets
requirements.2: Be friend with 12 animals simultaneously. Dead pets are included

reward.Animal Whisperer trait: Makes it much easier to train animals and directly impacts the speed of gain for relationships with animals.

requirements.1: Work out at any Gym-type venue
Used the 'Push the limits' object interaction on a piece of gym equipment for 1 hour while also affected by the Energized Emotion

Reach a Sim's maximum body potential. To do this, keep working out at both strength exercises like the weight bench and cardio exercises like treadmills to maximize muscle and minimize fat respectively

reward.Long Lived trait: Permanently increases their natural life span. This trait doesn't help from any accidents that may befall the Sim.

requirements.1: Use a Vending Machine or Computer to Purchase a Remedy or Deterrent
requirements.2: Use a Mt Komorebi Info Board
Actively Ski, Snowboard, or Rock Climb for 3 Hours
requirements.3: Encounter a Kodama or Forest Spirit

requirements.0: Perform High Intensity Skiing or Snowboarding on an Intermediate or Expert Slope
requirements.1: Successfully Reach the Peak of Mt Komorebi
requirements.2: Endure an Injury Sustained from Skiing, Snowboarding, or Rock Climbing

requirements.1: Achieve level 8 Skiing, Snowboarding, or Rock Climbing Skill
requirements.2: Successfully Complete High Intensity Skiing or Snowboarding on an Expert Slope or Rock Climbing During Inclement Weather

reward.Survival Instinct trait: These Sims will always escape wildlife attacks unscathed, manage to avoid injury from Skiing, Snowboarding, and Rock Climbing more often than other Sims, and have a natural resistance to inclement weather.

requirements.2: Win Gold in 5 Master Horse Competitions
requirements.3: Place at the Ultimate Horse Championship

reward.Grand Champ Trainer trait: These Sims train Horse Skills faster, sell Horses for higher prices, inspire confidence in themselves and their Horse when riding and training, and will very rarely have a bad time riding a Horse. They are so good with Horses that Horses have even more fun when being ridden by them. They can also Give Competition Advice to aspiring Horse Riders.

requirements.1: Draw all 5 picture types on the Activity Table

reward.Creatively Gifted: Creatively Gifted Sims learn adult creative skills faster.

requirements.0: Play on a Jungle Gym while Playful
Make it across the Monkey Bars 3 times
requirements.1: Earn a High Score on the Typing Game

reward.Physically Gifted: Physically Gifted Sims build adult physical skills faster.

reward.Socially Gifted: Socially Gifted Sims build adult social skills faster.

requirements.0: Read with an Adult for 2 hours
Achieve a grade of 'A' at school

reward.Mentally Gifted: Mentally Gifted Sims build adult mental skills faster.

requirements.0: Achieve Gold in a Slumber Party Event

reward.Practiced Host: These Sims are some of the best event hosts. Their friendly and funny socials during parties will always succeed.

requirements.0: Go 12 Hours without a Negative Need Moodlet

reward.Headstrong: These Sims have learned to discipline their body and minds. Their Focused and Confident moodlets will last longer!.

requirements.0: Stomp Playfully on a Splash Pad

reward.Pack Animal: These Sims love improving themselves and others together. They have faster relationship and skill gain when training with friends!.

requirements.0: Sleep in a Treehouse for 6 hours

reward.Idea Person: These Sims focused on a combination of mental and creativity skills during their childhood. Due to their efforts they can now paint, write, program, and write songs faster. Any writer's block will also vanish much more quickly!.

requirements.2: Have earned 25,000 in royalties publishing books

reward.Poetic Trait: Unlocks the ability to write the Book of Life, an object that can bring Sim Ghosts back to life.

requirements.0: Practice music (of any instrument) for 6 total hours
requirements.1: Listen to music (either live or a radio objects) for 2 total hours

requirements.0: Achieve level 4 Skill with any instrument
requirements.1: Play any instrument for 1 hour while being inspired

requirements.0: Achieve level 6 Skill with any instrument
Achieve level 10 Skill with any instrument
requirements.1: Spend 75 total hours playing any instrument or instruments
requirements.2: Mentor others in any instrument for 3 hours

reward.Piper trait: Unlocks songs that can otherwise not be played that can significantly affect other Sims who are listening.

requirements.1: Sell 3 paintings to collectors of the art gallery
requirements.2: Complete 3 emotional paintings of any emotion

requirements.0: View or admire 3 paintings at a museum

reward.Expressionistic trai: Allows them to create paintings of any Emotion regardless of whether they're currently feeling that emotion.

requirements.1: Practice Acting at a mirror for 2 total hours

requirements.2: Earn a gold rating in a commercial gig

requirements.1: Recieve an award in the actor career
requirements.2: Earn a gold rating in a TV show gig

requirements.1: Place a Celebrity Tile in Starlight Boulevard
requirements.2: Earn a gold rating in a movie gig

reward.World-Renowned Actor trait: Guarantees success on any acting action.

requirements.1: Collect insects from an Insect Farm 3 times

requirements.2: Complete 5 gigs as a Freelance Crafter

reward.Muse of the Maker: Allows the sim to fabricate items at a reduced cost.

requirements.0: Achieve level 4 of the Knitting Skill
requirements.2: Sell a Knitted Object on Plopsy
Achieve level 6 of the Knitting Skill
requirements.3: Successfully Show Off Your Knitted Sweater to Another Sim

level 4.name: Lord or Lady of the Knits

requirements.0: Achieve level 10 of the Knitting Skill

reward.Sacred Knitting Knowledge trait: Makes your sim immune to the sweater curse, and they are able to actually reverse the sweater curse on other sims who are currently dealing with it. They are also going to be able to create that beautifully hideous forbidden sweater that is covered in pom-poms, and can also create the yarny toys from the EA game Unraveled.

requirements.0: Perform 10 Mean- or Mischief-type social interactions. These actions do not need to succeed to count
Use mischief-type interactions with a computer 3 times

reward.Tormenter trait: Guarantees success in sabotaging objects and nearly guarantees to success in any Mischief-type social interaction.

requirements.0: Perform 10 mean or mischief type social interactions. These actions do not need to succeed to count
Have a Declared Enemy. This is a special social interaction and can either be done by your Sim, or by a different Sim onto you
requirements.1: Reach level 4 of the criminal career
requirements.2: Get into 5 fights. You do not need to win the fights

requirements.0: Witness the death of a sim
requirements.1: Reach level 8 of the criminal career

reward.Mastermind trait: Unlocks special social interactions to force a target to change to a negative Emotion.

reward.Twisted Heart trait: Allows Sim to gain bonus social from mean and mischief socials, while shrugging off sad and embarrassed moods much faster than other sims.

0.name: Grilled Cheese
0.hidden: You can unlock this aspiration by cooking three single-serving dishes of grilled cheese, then eating them all in a row. It's possible group servings work too and may save time, but I didn't test it. Move the plates near your Sim while they are eating the first, which ensures they can eat them faster so no bug gets in your way. You will get a notification in the top-right portion of the screen that the aspiration has been unlocked. Press 'G' or go to the aspirations tab in the bottom-right menu, select the change aspiration button.

requirements.0: Talk to 3 Different Sims About Grilled Cheese
Eat 10 Excellent Quality Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
requirements.1: Cook 3 Group Servings of Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
requirements.2: Talk to 5 Different Sims About Grilled Cheese

requirements.0: Eat a Grilled Cheese Sandwich in Space
requirements.1: Cook an Excellent Quality Grilled Cheese Sandwich
requirements.2: Talk to the Grim Reaper About Grilled Cheese

reward.Melt Master: Allows you to click your Sims and 'Summon Grilled Cheese'.

requirements.2: Earn a silver rating when hosting a dinner party

requirements.1: Reach level 4 of the culinary career
requirements.2: Create 3 excellent-quality meals or gourmet meals

requirements.0: Reach level 8 of the culinary career
requirements.2: Cook 3 gourmet meals at a single event of any kind

reward.Fresh Chef trait: allows Sims to automatically cook perfect quality meals that also never spoil whenever they cook food. This does not apply to drinks made at bars.

requirements.0: Mix 3 drinks at a single event
requirements.1: Join the mixology branch of the culinary career
requirements.2: Achieve level 7 of the mixology Skill

reward.Potion Master trait: Unlocks special recipes when mixing drinks which can influence the drinker's Emotions.

reward.Nectar Know-It-All trait: These Sims can craft pre-aged Nectar, have an iron bladder when it comes to drinking Nectar, and their negative emotions have less influence on their current mood.

requirements.0: Earn §5,000. This counts sold collectibles, Career income, and sold artistic works

reward.Shrewd trait: Causes automatic cash deposits into the Sim's bank account every week.

requirements.1: Purchase §5,000 worth of landscaping objects (including trees, garden items, or pools)

reward.Thrifty trait: Allows Sims to regain 10% of the purchase price of any objects bought in Build Mode. The discount won't be applied right away, but will be given in the form of a refund that adds up all purchases over that week.

requirements.0: Practice the programming Skill for 5 total hours
requirements.1: Play video games for 5 total hours

requirements.0: Maintain the focused emotion for 2 continuous hours while playing video games

requirements.1: Reach level 3 of the tech guru career
requirements.2: Make a video game or app

requirements.0: Reach level 5 of the tech guru career
requirements.1: Have spent 100 total hours doing anything on computers

reward.Webmaster trait: Unlocks special, powerful interactions with their computers.

requirements.1: Craft an object on the woodworking table
Launch or upgrade a rocket 5 times

reward.Handy trait: Allows instant repair or upgrade of any object. The Sim still needs the parts if they want to upgrade objects, but such repairs or upgrades will happen instantly

reward.Professorial trait: Allows the Sim to write a book through any computer that creates a Skill Book in any given Skill, assuming they already are a master of that Skill. This doesn't help the Sim who owns the trait, but the book can be read by any other Sim for a massive Skill gain.

requirements.2: Finish a Course with an A Grade

requirements.0: Have a Term GPA of B or Higher

requirements.1: Contribute Knowledge on a Research Archive Machine
requirements.3: Get a Job Using a Degree

reward.Higher Education trait: Allows the sim to gain more skill using the Electromagnetic Research Archive Machine and earn more money from Publishing Research Papers and Contributing Knowledge.

requirements.1: Search for information on Vampires with a computer

requirements.2: Survive 20 days as a Vampire (after unlocking this level)

reward.True Master trait: Allows the use of the Irresistible Vampire Command on all Vampire Offspring.

requirements.0: Excavate 3 dig piles or dig sites with archaeology
requirements.1: Uncover any artifact via the pop-up archaeology table
Survey for a dig pile (click the ground in any lot in Selvadorada; must have level 4 Achaeology for the command to appear)
requirements.2: Authenticate 3 artifacts via the Pop-Up Archaeology Table

requirements.1: Write a Good-quality Archaeology Skill Book (requires high Writing Skill levels as well)

reward.Museum Patron trait: Gives your Sim additional positive moodlets from visiting any museum-type lot

requirements.2: Cast a Spell on Another Sim

reward.Slinger of Spells trait: Allows your sim to generate much less charge when casting spells

requirements.0: Introduce yourself to sims from 3 different city neighborhoods
requirements.1: Give an apartment key to a friend (Requires that you live in an apartment in a city nighborhood

requirements.0: Achieve level 3 in the singing Skill
requirements.1: Light fireworks during the humor and hijinks festival
Kiss someone at the romance festival
requirements.2: Complete a mural at the arts center

requirements.0: Achieve level 5 in the singing Skill

reward.In the Know trait: Gets your sim significant discounts when purchasing anything from a market stall. In the Know has no effect on purchases from other sources including Build Mode.

requirements.1: Earn gold on a goaled Kava Party
requirements.2: Eat a coconut. These are buyable from the shack at the public beach lot

requirements.0: Find objects using the Beachcomb… > Comb Beach for Seashells interaction at any beach area in Sulani
Explore the beach cave on Mua Pel'am
Use the Doze-Off self-interaction while lounging on a beach chair or pool floatie

reward.Laid-Back trait: Completely prevents the Tense Emotion from triggering.

requirements.0: Eat Food at the Festival of Light, Snow, or Youth
requirements.1: Take a Selfie with the Mt. Komorebi Mascot
requirements.2: Collect a Simmi by Popping Open a Simmi Capsule
requirements.3: Swim for 1 Hour in Wakaba's River

requirements.0: Soak for a Long Time in a Hot Spring
requirements.1: Wear a Festival Costume from a Vending Machine
Make a Wish On or Collect a Forest Spirit
requirements.2: Take it Slow and Become Emotionally Mindful

reward.Worldly Knowledge trait: These Sims are better at socializing during Social Events and enjoy ordering food from market stalls. They also can “Negotiate a Discount” at market stalls, which gives them an advantage over other bargaining techniques.

requirements.1: Let 3 Kitchen or Bathroom Objects Get Dirty
requirements.2: Let At least One Floor level of Your Home Become Dirty
requirements.3: Max Out Sim’s Fun Motive While on a Dusty, Dirty, or Filthy Floor

requirements.2: Cook 3 Meals in a Dirty or Filthy Kitchen

requirements.1: Bathe or Shower 3 Times in a Dirty Shower or Tub
requirements.2: Don’t Wash Your Hands After Using the Toilet
requirements.3: Invite a Guest Over While House is Dirty or Filthy

requirements.1: Throw a Party Social Event in a Filthy House
requirements.2: Appease a Filth Fiend with a Filth Tribute

reward.Filth Dweller trait: This sim no longer receives negative moodlets from living in dusty or messy environments. They love cleaning and love filth, and will receive happy moodlets while in dirty or filthy houses. Additionally, they gain the ability to bond with and befriend filth friends.

requirements.1: Wash Hands After Using the Toilet
requirements.2: Show Off Your Clean House to Guests

requirements.0: Purchase a Handheld and Upright Vacuum
requirements.1: Destroy 3 Dust Bunnies or Filth Fiends with Vacuum Cleaner
requirements.2: Destroy 5 Messy or Dust Pile Objects with Vacuum Cleaner
requirements.3: Perform 2 Upgrades on a Vacuum Cleaner

requirements.0: Throw a Party Social Event in a Clean House
requirements.1: Clean for 5 Hours in a Happy, Confident, Inspired, or Focused Mood
requirements.2: Successfully Ask or Demand that Other Sims Clean 3 Times

reward.Fast & Fastidious trait: Sims don't get negative moodlets or lose fun while cleaning. Sim will clean at a more rapid pace and is more likely to become focused when cleaning, and can use the “Power Clean” and “Power Vacuum” interactions.

requirements.1: Have strong romantic relationship level with 3 sims simultaneously

requirements.0: Earn gold levels on 3 dates. Does not matter who your dating partner is for any or all three
requirements.1: Have had 8 total boyfriends and/or girlfriends

reward.Player trait: Prevents other Sims from getting jealous of their actions, such as using a Romantic-type interaction on a different Sim in front of their spouse. Note that Sims with the Player trait can themselves still feel jealousy (unless the Sim who would make them jealous also has the Player trait).

requirements.0: Earn silver ratings on 2 dates with your spouse
requirements.1: Achieve Soulmate relationship status with your spouse

requirements.0: Execute 50 successful romantic social interactions with your spouse while you're both soulmates to each other
requirements.1: Earn gold ratings on 3 dates with your spouse

reward.Companion trait: Unlocks special social interactions with the Sim's spouse. Note that the Sim must be married to take advantage of these perks; the special interactions will not unlock with unmarried lovers.

reward.Angler's Tranquility: Sims with this trait gain special buffs during the act of fishing that can help cancel negative Emotions.

reward.Naturalist trait: Protects the Sim from fire and allows them to quickly extinguish any fire.

requirements.0: Send 5 items to the Geological Council

reward.Appraiser trait: Increases the amount of money earned from selling any collectible to the Simsonian Museum.

requirements.0: Sell Power or Water on a utility bill
Attempt to convince a Sim to Vote on a Neighbourhood Action Plan
requirements.1: Vote on Neighbourhood Action Plans two separate times
requirements.2: Reach level 10 of the Civil Designer career

reward.Influential Individual trait: Allows the sim to get the community to cheer on a local hero, or cancel them on a whim.

requirements.0: Purchase 1 Cow, Chicken, or Llama on Your Home Lot
requirements.1: Socialize with a Fox, Rabbit, or Bird 5 Times
requirements.2: Purchase 1 Garden Patch for Your Home Lot
requirements.3: Visit Finchwick, Old New Henford, and the Bramblewood Neighborhoods in Henford-on-Bagley

requirements.0: Befriend a Chicken, Cow, or Llama
requirements.1: Place 1 Wild Rabbit Home or Flock of Wild Birds on Your Home Lot

requirements.0: Give 3 Gifts to Foxes, Rabbits, or Birds
Reach Maximum Relationship with a Cow, Chicken, or Llama
requirements.1: Receive 3 Gifts from Rabbits or Birds
requirements.2: Win a Competition in Henford-on-Bagley’s Finchwick Fair

reward.Nature Conversationalist trait: Grants the Sim's animals better relationships and lifespan, grants unique plant interactions, reduced bills in Henford-on-Bagley, and free grocery delivery.

requirements.1: Catch 5 fish in the Granite Falls neighborhood
Cook 2 plates of beetles over a campfire

requirements.2: Befriend the Hermit of Granite Falls

requirements.1: Sleep for 5 nights in a tent

reward.Survivalist trait: Provides extreme buffs to a Sim's mood if they are camping, whether using the camping gear or just sleeping under the stars.

requirements.0: Buy 3 goods at the marketplace stalls in front of the cantina
requirements.1: Eat a Selvadoradian meal (buyable from the food stall next to the market stalls, but this does not count for any food bought from within the cantina itself)
requirements.2: View Statue of Madre Cosecha (a specific object adjacent to a fountain in front of the front door to the cantina)

requirements.1: Find an Area off the Path (this means successfully win a chance card while Exploring the Jungle after clearing an archway of ivy)
requirements.2: Examine 3 traps (successfully disarming the traps you examine is not necessary to clear this task)

requirements.0: Defend against 2 natural dangers (Simply having the proper defensive spray in your pocket when struck is enough to clear this task. This is easily done by buying a few Spider Repellents at the marketplace, then hanging out at the cheapest rental property. Otherwise it will likely happen in the course of Exploring the Jungle if you have the sprays in your pockets.)
Open 3 Rare Omiscan Treasure Chests (generally one is found in the final room of Jungle Temples, thus necessitating at least three complete temple explorations)
requirements.2: Find 5 Omiscan Treasures (likely will be completed in tandem as you chase the first task)

reward.Treasure Hunter trait: Increases the value and contents of all treasure chests if this Sim opens them.

reward.Master Mixer trait: A Master Mixer rarely fails when using potions on themselves.

requirements.0: Meet someone new in 3 different lot locations. These can be in the same or different neighborhoods.

reward.Beloved trait: Prevents all natural decay from all relationships. Relationships can still be damaged through negative social interactions.

requirements.0: Execute Funny-type social interactions with 5 different Sims
Join the Comedian branch of the Entertainer Career

reward.Hilarious trait: Unlocks a few special Funny-type social interactions and guarantees success with all jokes that are told by the Sim.

requirements.0: Successfully advise and influence the lives of other Sims

reward.Confidante trait: Increases the chance of conversations being pleasant. In other words, Sims that have the Confidante trait are less susceptible to experiencing Boring or Awkward conversations.

requirements.1: Earn silver ratings on 3 social events

requirements.0: Earn silver ratings on 3 thrown parties
requirements.1: Attend social events at 5 different venues

requirements.2: Earn gold ratings on 2 thrown parties

reward.Perfect Host trait: Grants an automatic score boost to any party they throw.

requirements.1: Be in a club gathering for 12 hours
Talk about clubs with 5 club members

reward.Natural Leader trait: rants three perks: they will always succeed when overthrowing a Club leader, they can never be overthrown themselves, and they will gain Club Points faster when doing club-approved actions.

requirements.2: Host a Meet and Greet; the rating is irrelevant

requirements.1: Be asked three times for a selfie from fans
Receive 25 positive responses when inciting cheers

reward.Unstoppable Fame trait: Freezes fame decay, makes them never react poorly to paparazzi, and gives them an additional Fame point for Celebrity Perks.

requirements.0: Use a computer to search for information on Vampires

requirements.2: Avoid drinking deeply for 5 consecutive days

requirements.1: Get permission to drink from 2 different Sims
requirements.2: Purchase the Tamed Thirst Vampire Power
requirements.3: Create 3 plasma packs from fish or frogs

requirements.1: Don't drink without permission for 14 consecutive days
requirements.2: Harvest from a plasma fruit tree 3 times

reward.Regained Humanity trait: Gives a much stronger chance to success when asking a human Sim to willingly allow you to drink their blood.

requirements.0: Order a drink at Oga’s Cantina

requirements.1: Complete 5 Missions for the Scoundrel Faction

requirements.0: Successfully Bribe a First Order Stormtrooper
requirements.2: Successfully Cheat and Win at Sabacc

requirements.1: Explore 5 times in the Millennium Falcon

reward.Sleight of Hand trait: Allows your sim to Pickpocket other Sims and never get caught cheating at Sabacc.

requirements.1: Ask About Resistance or First Order presence on Batuu
requirements.2: Complete a Mission for the Resistance or First Order Faction

reward.A Gift of Credits: A payment of credits by your chosen faction for your support in their cause.

2.name: Paragon of Hope
2.hideous: You can unlock this aspiration by completing both 'Hope vs Order' and 'Galactic Privateer' aspirations

requirements.2: Override Locks and Loot 2 Supply Crates in the First Order District

requirements.0: Infiltrate the First Order Cargo Building and Slice the Holotable

reward.Heroic Presence: Allows your sim to gain Charisma more easily, and can also inspire other Sims with their presence.

3.name: Enforce of Order
3.hidden: You can unlock this aspiration by completing both 'Hope vs Order' and 'Galactic Privateer' aspirations

requirements.0: Recruit 3 Sims to join the First Order
requirements.1: Seize Goods From 2 Supply Crates in Black Spire Outpost
requirements.2: Complete 2 Missions for the First Order
Arrest a Member of  the Resistance

requirements.0: Infiltrate the Resistance Bunker and Slice the Holotable
requirements.1: Explore 5 times in the TIE echelon

reward.Completion reward trait: Sims with Supreme Authority have an edge during fights and can show their might, encouraging other Sims to back down from hostile socials with them. These Sims are also less likely to die from anger.

requirements.2: Mess around in the cuddle carts

requirements.0: Be mean on Social Bunny 5 times

reward.Untroubled: Untroubled Sims always bounce back. Being a Drama Llama can leave relationships rocky. Nothing says carefree like moving on and letting go.

requirements.0: Reach level 3 of an after-school activity
Reach level 3 of a side hustle

reward.Highflier: Highflier Sims have the potential to be more successful, especially in business.

requirements.0: Ask a Sim out on a date 5 times

reward.Dauntless: Dauntless Sims always live life to the fullest, and the Grim Reaper has a soft spot for dauntless pleas during matters of life and death. Risky fun sure has its perks.

requirements.1: Earn Gold on any hosted party

reward.Iconic: Iconic Sims are the ones everyone wants to follow. They've earned the admiration of their peers, and can now set their sights anywhere on the world wide web.

reward.Clear Perspective trait: Allows you to click on your Sim and choose “Have a Moment of Clarity.” You'll get a moodlet that makes you immune to negative emotions for three hours.

reward.Self-Care Expertise trait: Allows your sim to cough up way more money for their services

reward.Calming Aura trait: Allows sim to use newfound ability to calm Sims around them.

reward.Fanged Friend trait: Helps you to boost your relationship gains with all sims

requirements.0: Read to a child for 2 total hours
requirements.2: Execute 10 social interactions with your child

requirements.1: Be friends 3 of your own children

requirements.0: Execute 10 social interactions with your child or grandchild
requirements.2: Become good friends with 4 children or grandchildren

reward.Matriarch or Patriarch trait: Applies bonuses to Skill gain rates whenever the Sim's children (adopted or by blood) are nearby on the same lot.

requirements.0: Read to a child for 2 total hours
requirements.2: Execute 10 social interactions with your child

requirements.0: Help a child with homework 3 times
requirements.1: Have a Teenage child earn an A in high school
requirements.2: Have a child reach level 10 in any Skill

requirements.0: Execute 3 Mentor interactions on your child
requirements.1: Have a child complete any Aspiration
requirements.2: Have a child or grandchild reach level 10 of any Career

reward.Vicarious trait: Allows Sims to automatically acquire small Skill gains when their children (adopted or by blood) gain skills as well.

reward.Master trait: Allows greater command over their Vampire Offspring.

requirements.0: Read to a child for 2 total hours
requirements.2: Execute 10 social interactions with your child

requirements.0: Hep a child with homework 3 times
requirements.1: Have a teenage child earn an A in high school
requirements.2: Have a child reach level 10 in any Skill

requirements.0: Execute 3 mentor interactions on your child
requirements.1: Have a child complete any aspiration
requirements.2: Have a child or grandchild reach level 10 of any career

reward.Role Model trait: Provides a passive buff to their nearby Toddlers, Children, and Teens increasing their Character Values.

0.name: Arts and Crafts
0.requirements: To earn this badge, make crafts, drawings, or paintings.

1.name: Civic Responsibility
1.requirements: To earn this badge, perform cleaning or repair actions.

2.name: Give Back
2.requirements: To earn this badge, donate items for charity via the Mailbox and Computer or perform the friendly social to Give Gifts.

3.name: Good Deeds
3.requirements: To earn this badge, entertain a toddler, make someone laugh, take out the trash or help someone with their homework.

4.name: Keep Fit
4.requirements: To earn this badge, perform dance or exercise activities.

5.name: Outdoor Adventurer
5.requirements: To earn this badge, perform outdoorsy activities like catching fish, finding frogs, or grilling outdoors.

6.name: Scholarly Aptitude
6.requirements: To earn this badge, perform studious activities like reading books or completing homework.

7.name: Sociability
7.requirements: To earn this badge, perform friendly socials with another Sim.

8.name: Young Scientist
8.requirements: To earn this badge, perform scientific activities like computer programming or using the microscope and telescope.
